Name: The Hard Game
About the game: My goodness! This game is quite hard, yes absolutely positively it is! Do you think you have what it takes to beat such a HARD game? I know I can't! Along the way meet Amber, a lovely little helper to give you some much needed 'encouragment' through your playthrough! Platform through five challenging levels to claim some wonderful rewards provided at the end of each level, of course, by our wonderful Amber! Watch out for the spikes and don't fall or else you must start all over again! Because, as I said, this game is HARD.
